p1.en: POLI‚Ä¢Estudio was born in 2020 to create imaginary scenarios in projects of different scales, with the vision of continuing to grow and betting on innovative ideas. Based in Buenos Aires, Argentina, it is made up of architects who are passionate about design, photography and new technologies.

p2.en: Each project is unique and pursues key objectives: understanding and transmitting its essence, highlighting its most attractive aspects and creating photorealistic immersive environments. For this, different disciplines such as art, photography, interior design, urban planning, virtual reality and architecture are combined.
p2.es: Cada proyecto es √∫nico y persigue objetivos clave: entender y transmitir su esencia, resaltar sus aspectos m√°s atractivos y crear ambientes inmersivos fotorealistas. Para eso, se combinan distintas disciplinas como el arte, la fotograf√≠a, el dise√±o de interiores, el urbanismo, la realidad virtual y la arquitectura.

Para isso, combinam-se diferentes disciplinas como arte, fotografia, design de interiores, planejamento urbano, realidade virtual e arquitetura.

p3.en: We believe in the importance of finding new ways to improve, transmit and enjoy architecture. Technology, and in particular the field of Archviz, help us blur the boundaries between the physical world and the digital world.
p3.es: Creemos en la importancia de encontrar nuevas formas de mejorar, transmitir y disfrutar de la arquitectura. La tecnolog√≠a, y en particular el campo del Archviz, nos ayudan a desdibujar los l√≠mites entre el mundo f√≠sico y el mundo digital.
